entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:06 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 02:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %

Wind: SE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
